Header: Suspect arrested over double murder in Kilinochchi
Content: A suspect has been arrested with respect to double murder carried out in the Jayanthinagar area in Kilinochchi. The Kilinochchi Police conducted an investigation into the murder of a mother and son in a house in the Jayanthinagar area in Kilinochchi. The suspect was taken into custody during an operation carried out by an investigative team drawing special attention to cut injuries that were found on the two dead bodies. During interrogation, the Police were able to detect several mobile phones from a well. Preliminary investigations revealed that the murders had been carried through assaults on the head.
